name: AMG
description:
Doomsday is a sci-fi interstellar war strategy online game.

*Real 360°-3D visual experience, immersively experience epic space warfare!
*Players from all over the world are in the same universe, create a legion and compete with players from all over the world for the supremacy of the universe!
*Build your own space station, lead your space fleet to win every war, and test your war strategy!

Here, there is everything you want!
The universe needs a new ruler, join now and create your empire!
developers: 成都爱迪科信科技有限公司
publishers: 成都爱迪科信科技有限公司
